actions.title: Actions
actions.logoutWarn: You cannot log in again without the secret

draft.cantAttachImage: Please set up Imgur client ID in settings.

secret.warn: Make sure no one is looking at your screen.

profile.title: Profile
profile.secretCannotBeRestored: Since this account was imported using the private key instead of the secret code, the secret code cannot be restored.

loginType.masterKey: You are currently logged in using the master-key. Switch to a more secure sub-key login immediately.
loginType.subKey: You are currently logged in using a sub-key.
loginType.secret: You are currently logged in using the master-key by directly entering the secret key.

switchToSubKey.descSaveMasterKey: You will need this key to migrate or recover your account. If it becomes known to others, your account could be accessed illegally, so it must be kept absolutely confidential.
switchToSubKey.alertMasterKey:
This is the last opportunity to download your master-key! If you fail to back it up here, this account can never be recovered.
We recommend storing it in a secure and reliable way, such as printing it and keeping it in a safe.
switchToSubKey.mailHerf: mailto:?subject=concurrent secret&body=**Set the recipient of this email to yourself and send it.**%0D%0A%0D%0A=== Identification Info ===%0D%0AIdentifier: {{ ccid }}%0D%0AMaster Key: {{ mnemonic }}%0D%0A================%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0AThe master key is the only passphrase that proves you own the account identified by this identifier.%0D%0AIf this key becomes known to a malicious third party, the security of this account will be compromised, and you will need to take steps to freeze the account yourself.%0D%0A%0D%0AThe master key will be used for important operations such as migrating your account or recovering lost sub-keys.%0D%0AUntil then, store it securely, such as by printing it and keeping it in a safe deposit box.%0D%0A
switchToSubKey.descVerifyBackup: Are you ready? Let's confirm that you have stored the master-key correctly.
switchToSubKey.removeMasterKey: Remove the master-key from this device
switchToSubKey.descRemoveMasterKey: Since the master-key is highly confidential information, we will generate a 'proxy' sub-key from the master-key, and replace the master-key with the sub-key on this device.
switchToSubKey.ready: Remove the master-key completely from this device and switch to the sub-key
switchToSubKey.aboutMasterKey:
The master-key is the only passphrase that proves you are the owner of the account identified by this identifier.
If this key becomes known to a malicious third party, the security of this account will be compromised, and you will need to take steps to freeze the account yourself.
The master-key will be used for important operations such as migrating your account or recovering lost sub-keys. Until then, keep it stored in a secure and reliable way, such as printing it and keeping it in a safe.
switchToSubKey.name: Name
switchToSubKey.addition: The reference information is from when this certificate was issued and may have changed since then.

media.title: Media
media.afterRegisteringImgur: After registering with Imgur, go to
media.oauth2: and create application with option "OAuth 2 authorization without a callback URL"

descs.domain: Domain Storage refers to the storage provided by this domain. It can be used without any setup, but there is a maximum capacity set. Additionally, the list of files may be viewed by administrators and files that violate the terms may be deleted.
descs.imgur: Imgur is used for image uploads. It can be set up relatively easily. The content that can be uploaded is subject to Imgur's terms.
descs.s3: S3 is used for image uploads. S3-compatible services like CloudFlare R2 can also be used. It requires more effort to set up, but allows you to keep files under your own control. Charges may apply depending on the service, but in most cases, it will fit within the free tier.

ap.title: ActivityPub
ap.helperText: The following charaters can be used: a-z, A-Z, 0-9

qr.title: Login Code
qr.tip1: You can only see generated codes once. Generate a new code only when you need it.
qr.tip2: You can check created keys in the Settings > Identity page.

welcome.description: Concurrent is a new type of decentralized social networking service that connects you to countless servers with just one account.

feature1.title: No need to create an account for each server anymore
feature1.description: Traditional decentralized SNS required you to create an account for each server. Concurrent uses a secret key to prove your identity across countless servers with just one account.

feature2.title: Timelines for different topics
feature2.description: Concurrent allows you to freely create community timelines called 'Streams'. Say goodbye to the hassle of switching between multiple accounts on traditional social networks because you feel a bit hesitant to discuss certain topics with all of your followers. Gather and enjoy conversations about your favorite topics in casual streams with like-minded people.

wip.title: Concurrent is currently under development.
wip.description: We are in the middle of adding exciting features and many functionalities are not available yet. We would be delighted if you could play around with it as a form of sightseeing!
wip.contribute: If you find any bugs or have great ideas, raise an issue on Github and join the development now!

milestones.title: Planned features
milestones.item2: - Media-specific Posts & Media Lists for Users
milestones.item3: - Various Filtering Options such as Muting

welcome.title: Let's create your Concurrent account!
welcome.notice: We are still adding features and the explanations are brief. We would be happy if you could play with it as a form of sightseeing!

yourID.title: Your ID
yourID.desc1: This is the string that identifies you in the world of Concurrent.
yourID.desc2: It is a random string so that you can be equally identified from any server.
yourID.desc3: Next, we will create a secret code to prove that you are the owner of this ID.
yourID.next: Next: Creating your ID's Secret Code

saveSecret.title: Secret Code
saveSecret.desc1: The secret code is a spell you need when you want to log in again or log in from a different device.
saveSecret.desc2: Make sure you never lose it and that nobody else ever finds out about it.
saveSecret.desc3: If you lose it, you will never be able to access your account again. If someone else finds out, your account will become a shared account with a hacker.
saveSecret.didyousave: Have you taken a note of it?

verifyCode.title: Confirming the Secret Code
verifyCode.notMatch: The secret code does not match

chooseDomain.title: Choosing a Domain
chooseDomain.desc1: Let's find a domain that will store and deliver your messages.
chooseDomain.desc2: No matter which domain you choose, you can connect with anyone.
chooseDomain.desc3: Also, (if the server manager works hard) you can always move to a different domain.
chooseDomain.notice: You will now move from concurrent.world to a domain jurisdiction site
chooseDomain.tips: Tips: If you're setting up your own server, click here
chooseDomain.notRegistered: Registration at the domain is not confirmed. Please register at the domain you jump to.
chooseDomain.nextDisabled: You can proceed to the next step once registration at the domain is complete

createProfile.title: Creating a Profile
createProfile.desc: Here you set your name, icon, and self-introduction.

import.notFound: Your server could not be found. You can continue by entering it manually.
import.invalidSecret: The secret code is not correct.
import.notFoundOnServer: Your account could not be found on the specified server.
import.connectionError: Could not connect to the specified server.
import.input: Enter the secret code or private key
